basics.name: Edson Boldrini
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary:
I like to say: "I solve problems and give systems working assurance: first I build and make it work, then I improve."

 I am a Full Stack Software Engineer who love this carrer, 3+ years experience building APIs, web apps and mobile apps. I specialize in JavaScript and Flutter and have professional experience working with NodeJS, Vue, Hasura, Docker, AWS, Elixir and of course Flutter. I also have some experience or experimental attempts with C# (.NET core), React and React Native. Take a look at my projects on github or get in touch! I don't have many public projects available on my github, but I'm working on filling it out.

 I am passionate about knowledge and I work every day to be the best version of myself.

location.address: Rua Julio Cesar de Oliveira Serrano, 135

work.name: w3.care
work.position: Full Stack Engineer (Mobile and Frontend specially)
highlights: I was co responsible to rebuild the main app of company focusing in a better code and better architecture

work.name: Além
work.summary: My role was to write the back-end and front-end components chasing the requirements of the architecture and figma mocks fulfilling our user stories. I also process pull requests and discuss the architecture decisions with the team in an agile software development environment. Technologies used: Vue, SASS, NodeJS, Hasura, AdonisJS, Docker, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Github Actions, AWS (ECS, EC2, S3, Cloud Front, LoadBalancers, Cloud Watch).
highlights: I build the most part of the subscription product called by Club Trip
A lot of learning about AWS services

work.name: Conceptho
work.summary: My role was to write the back-end, front-end and mobile components chasing the requirements of the architecture and figma mocks fulfilling our user stories. I also process pull requests and discuss the architecture decisions with the team in an agile software development environment. Technologies used: Flutter (MobX), Vue, SASS, NodeJS, Hasura, AdonisJS, Docker, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Github Actions, AWS (ECS, EC2, S3, Cloud Front, LoadBalancers, Cloud Watch).
highlights: I build the most part of the security used by a news app including disabling or discouraging the user to make screenshots of protected areas
A lot of learning about paywalls and protected content

work.name: Dersalis
work.summary: My role was manage the developer team and to write the back-end, front-end and mobile components chasing the requirements of the architecture fulfilling our user stories. I also process pull requests and discuss the architecture decisions with the team in an agile software development environment. At the end, I was responsible to build and deploy the applications to production. Technologies used: Flutter (BloC, MobX, Modular), Vue, SASS, NodeJS, Elixir (Phoenix), Hasura, Docker, PostgreSQL, AWS (ECS, EC2, S3, Cloud Front, LoadBalancers).
highlights: I build from scratch the mobile apps used by Dersalis to manage smartbands and care of workers life
A lot of learning about realtime data and bunch of I/O

work.name: Le Card
work.description: Awesome payment and processing orders company
work.summary: My role was to write the back-end, front-end and mobile components chasing the requirements of the architecture and figma mocks fulfilling our user stories. I also process pull requests and discuss the architecture decisions with the team in an agile software development environment. We process payments using an mobile app with a bluetooth terminal. Technologies used: Xamarin, .NET Core, Razor Pages (MVVM), TDD, Microsoft Azure.
highlights: I build from scratch the mobile app used by the company to process payments
A lot of learning about payment and credit taxes
